variants.Description in input context: c.123G>A (p.G41D), associated with familial Parkinson's disease

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 cells expressing wild-type and mutant α-synuclein.

Readout description.Result Description: The variant NM_005902.3:c.123G>A showed increased protein aggregation and toxicity compared to wild-type α-synuclein.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type α-synuclein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein aggregation less than 20% observed in wild-type controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein aggregation greater than 60% observed in mutant samples.
